item.title: Best Places in Karnataka to Travel Solo During Hot Summer
item.description: Traveling solo can be one of the most freeing and enriching experiences. Karnataka, with its diverse landscapes, hills, forests, rivers, and historical sites, offers numerous destinations that are perfect for solo travelers, even during the hot summer months. While summers in Karnataka can get quite warm in lowland areas, you can escape the heat by visiting hill stations, forested regions, coasta
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Dandeli: Solo Trip Plan + Adventure Itinerary
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Dandeli promises an exciting adventure amidst nature, wildlife and thrilling activities. Here's a suggested itinerary for your solo trip: Day 1: Bangalore to Dandeli Morning: Departure from Bangalore Start your journey early in the morning to make the most of your day.
